product_name: Tifosi Podium S Interchangeable Sunglasses - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Featuring interchangeable lenses for any light level, the Tifosi Podium S sunglasses are designed for clear vision during muscle-powered adventures, from dawn runs to cycling in the afternoon sun. Frame includes 3 lenses (brown, red, and clear tints) that accommodate bright light, low-medium light and nighttime conditions. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, polycarbonate lenses are 20 times more impact resistant than glass and one-third the weight. Grilamid(R) TR90 lightweight nylon frames offer a consistent fit and flexibility in all temperatures and are extremely impact resistant. Rubber nosepiece and temple ends become tackier when wet for reliable grip during exercise and hot weather; nosepiece is easily removed for swapping lenses. Ventilated lenses increase airflow to eliminate fogging. Fits small to large profiles. Tifosi Podium S sunglasses include a semirigid carrying case and cleaning cloth. Closeout.
short_description: Featuring interchangeable lenses for any light level, the Tifosi Podium S sunglasses are designed for clear vision during muscle-powered adventures, from dawn runs to cycling in the afternoon sun.
